name: prettiness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being pleasant to look at, or attractive or pleasant in a delicate way: Her prettiness was matched by her intelligence. There is a prettiness and sweetness to his paintings. See
pretty
More examplesFewer examplesWe enjoyed the prettiness of the mountain villages and the gorgeous alpine meadows. She has a pale prettiness.The video, filmed with a soft prettiness, lacks any excitement.
